English: Maria... isn't here today.
Ah, I guess it's that day again...
That means... she must be there...
At his grave...
It was like walking through a thick fog of blood.
There was no reason to think.
There was no need to think.
All I needed was someone to fight. That was enough.
The Dark Lord had ordered me to hunt down the dragons and decimate the Earth.
And so, I devoured countless dragons and absorbed their powers.
The bloodthirsty Draconics Army continued to grow in strength.
But during the final battle against the warrior and his party, I...
...Hm? Why are you just standing there?
...!? Maria, I thought you went to visit Oricana's grave...
I already did, just like I've done for the past 100 years...
Can I ask you a question, Maria?
Hm?
...Do you not... despise me?
For killing the one... who was considered as your other half...
*Sigh* Didn't we already talk about this?
...Of course, I did hate your guts once.
But... you are also the last memento left behind by him.
Besides... You're not that person anymore.
You've changed too much... for me to ask of you to take responsibility for your past sins.
Becoming unshackled from the Dark Lord... and the awakening of my true nature...
It was the last gift... left behind by Oricana.
Even though our journey started off from resentment and curses...
Things have changed now.
Oricana may be gone... but now I have you.
Which is why the day he left... has technically become your birthday.
Well, maybe that kind of human tradition is kind of meaningless...
I'm sorry... for not taking care of you until now.
Thank you... Maria.
Hmm, let's try mixing a bit of this... and next...
Ha ha, the new medicine is close to completion...
Ah, I just can't wait to test it out already...
Ahem.
Happy birthday!
Huh? When did you get here?
What are you talking about? Birthday...?
Is it already that time of the year?
Hahaha, did you forget about your birthday again because of your research?
Well, this isn't the first time you've done that, ha ha...
You disappeared last year in search of some herbs, so we didn't even have a proper celebration.
That's why I suggested we have a big party this year if we have the chance!
Heh heh, and we obviously have some presents for you!
Ta-da!
Oh, wow… this is..
Are you sure about giving me something so valuable...?
Of course, it may be rare, but merchants have a knack for finding stuff like this!
I'll be able to get some more later.
Ahahaha...
Although I don't have any... poison for your research, Mediana...
I made some cake since it's your birthday after all.
Oh, what a nice cake.
Thank you, both of you.
You remembered my birthday while I completely forgot...
Heh heh...
Whoa!
...? Is that...?
*Whew* Sorry, my bad.
I had a hard time bringing this in because it's so heavy.
Wow, that's a huge monster...
Ah, yeah. It's a monster called Giant Hellhound that lives near the volcano.
It's notorious for being really tough and vicious.
Oh... So, why did you bring this monster?
Ah, this is a demonic beast that crossed over from Pandemonium.
I remember something about Mediana wanting to test her medicines on demons or demonic beasts...
And it's her birthday too, right?
I just couldn't come here empty-handed.
Hahaha... Thank you, everyone.
Thank you for the best birthday presents I've ever received.
Well then... Shall we start the experiment?
Oh, I can't wait to see Mediana's experiment in person!
Hahaha, I can't help but always think that... Mediana really loves her research.
Ahahaha...
Oh, Cleo! What kind of errand is it this time!?
I was wondering why she was so quiet today.
Well... I suppose it was the same during the birthdays from before...
Five years ago
Target confirmed. Currently approaching the central plaza.
We're approaching the target now. Are you ready?
H-hold on. My heels... Ugh...
...Change of plans. I am approaching the target.
I told you to wait. I won't lose him this time!
Shhh! Don't yell that out here...
Oh, dear... Looks like the husband is running away.
How terrible... Leaving behind his young wife like that...
...*Sigh*
...Let's pull back for now.
Three years ago
This 44th bomb!
...So, why did you call me out today?
Happy birthday!
You're... celebrating my birthday by fighting these monsters?
Right! See my new bomb power!
Super! Cool!
...I never want this sort of celebration ever again.
One year ago
I knew... this day would come sooner or later...
Doing part-time work to get money for food...
Why are you dragging your heels like that, Roi!?
We have to finish quickly to earn our bonus!
...*Sigh* How did I end up like this...?
I guess... Having to run an errand for Cleo sounds typical for my birthday.
Hm... This must be it. I just have to pick up that Flame Scroll from here?
Where's the contact?
Oh! That rear of yours is as perfect as I remember!
...This voice. Are you the contact?
Of course! Roi! I myself have personally brought this rare scroll that can't be found anywhere in the Empire these days!
Thank you. Farewell, then.
Hold on! I still have some unfinished business!
This is the end of my job. You can deal that with Cleo.
Aww, but my business is with you! Cleo told me to have fun with you!
Let's have a great time together today, Roi!
...Is that so? Fine. I'll take care of you first. Then, Cleo.
This birthday... isn't going to be any easier.
*Yawn*... A great start to a new day... Huh?
Good morning, Master.
Oh, good morning, Kara. What's with those clothes?
Today is Master's birthday.
Birthday. The day of a person's birth. The day to give presents to celebrate the happiness of the said person.
My present today for you Master, is to do my best in assisting your research for the day.
Wow!!!!!! Thanks, Kara.
But doing your best to assist my research? That's a strange resulting value for a present.
Kara, could you show me the research data on birthday presents?
Yes, Master. Displaying the data.
Birthday present? ...Don't you just give what the person likes the best?
What I want as a present? Princess, Demia, Clause... There's just so many.
Birthday present... Handmade presents are the best.
How about this wooden doll? Or I could engrave a lion, the royal symbol and...
The further conversation was deleted since his explanation continued for 30 minutes.
Birthday present? It obviously should be a top-quality silvervine!
I mean what kind of a cat wouldn't like that? Oh, this is a gift for a human?
Birthday present? There's no need for things like that. Just be happy every day. Idiots!
By the way... You! You look pretty strong. How about some duel with me?
Hm, I'm honored to have such a beautiful girl come talk to me.
A birthday present... Wouldn't it be best to give something the person likes the most?
It's money? Ha ha... Then, why don't you leave it to me?
I can double the amount at least! Can you wait a little bit?
I waited until midnight afterward, but had to return to the castle as he did not come back.
That is all.
Ahhhh! What is wrong with those samples!?
I'm sorry, Kara... I'll reset your AI.
Birthday present. Giving what the person likes the best to make them happy.
But I do not have any money.
That is why I am going to assist Master in his research to the best of my ability. Research is what you like the best, along with money.
I hope you will be happy with this present, Master.
Ha ha... Your offer is a bit strange, but I'm still delighted.
And I'm already happy! It's more than enough to know that you care about my happiness, Kara!
Heart. But I have not done any service yet.
No, Kara, your caring heart is more than enough!
Heart. Matters of the heart are always difficult.
It's okay, you're slowly learning about it!
Then, here is the most important message.
Master, happy birthday!
I hope you have a great day.
Yep! Thanks, Kara!
Shining brightest, even amongst those colorful flowers that were trying to stand out,
the slight blush on your cheeks as you gazed into my eyes
was what captured my heart that day.
Theo, happy birthday.
What are you doing?
...A flower?
Ah, you're going to give it to your lady?
...That sounds good.
Then, what are you waiting for? Go on and give it to her.
Well...
It's the same flower I received on my last birthday.
I see. I wouldn't know since I've never gotten anything like that...
...Oh, wait.
When's your birthday? Since this flower blooms around this time of the year, shouldn't it be soon?
That's right... it's today.
What is it?
What do you mean?
Why are you telling us that now!?
Jane, did you hear that? It's Mr. Handsome's birthday today!
Did you know?
...No, I don't remember.
Hm, since he's always working hard to protect you, shouldn't you prepare a present or something?
A present...?
Wait, we don't have time to waste.
We're going to camp here for the night, right? I'll be right back!
Right now?
What? You're going to give something to Mr. Handsome, Half Breed?
What are you getting for him?
I'm not telling you!
Ahaha, come on, don't be shy!
(The ex-lover and the best friend are working together for the same purpose?)
This is going to be fun.
Fun? We're just getting some birthday presents.
Ahaha, you really don't know anything, Half-breed. This is going to be really fun.
Well, I'm pretty sure how Mr. Handsome is going to react, but you never know.
I have no idea what you're talking about.
Let's see... The Princess and the Half Breed. Which one should I follow?
I knew I should have followed the Half Breed!
Hey, Mr. Handsome! Look at what this Half Breed made!
Hey! D-don't tell him!
...It's nothing big. Happy birthday. Open it later.
Thank you.
...It this... a talisman?
I told you to open it later... *Sigh*
It's... just something you can't get from this area.
I was going to make a pouch for it, but Succubus told me that wasn't necessary.
That's right! If you do that, it wouldn't be fair for the Princess!
Which means, it's time for the Princess to give a present!
...Theo, happy birthday.
At that moment,
the wind carrying the scent of that day started blowing again.
Thank you, my Lady.
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for being here today.
Today is the 15th birthday of Lady Jane, the glory of the Republic of Gray.
Please, give her a round of applause!
My lady, happy birthday! Every year, you grow even more gorgeous!
My lady! Congratulations! May you be happy now and forevermore!
Jane! Happy Birthday! See you at the ball later!
Lady Jane, I came from the eastern continent, just to see you.
Hey! Get in line! Princess, happy birthday!
Our manor was safe during the last monster conquest, thanks to the Lady and Knight of Loyalty.
Our family hereby pledges allegiance to you, my Lady.
I am so flattered. I merely did what needed to be done.
Thank you, all of you, for gathering here to celebrate my birthday.
We will begin the ball soon. Everyone, please enjoy yourselves!
Lady, would you give me the honor of the first dance with you?
Wait a second! I crossed the continent to dance with the Lady here. My lady, please dance with me!
I apologize, gentlemen, but I've already promised my first dance to someone else.
Jane! Are you not dancing? The next song is your favorite waltz!
Speaking of which, the ball is somewhat empty today! Hasn't the Knight of Loyalty returned from the conquest yet?
He will be here soon. That man keeps his word.
Theo, you don't need to rush.
My apologies, my Lady. I should not be late on this important occasion.
Haha, don't be. The day is not over yet.
Happy birthday, my Lady.
Thank you, Theo. And where is my present?
Oh, that is... I hurried here as quickly as I could. I am sorry, my Lady...
No, Theo. All I want is just one thing.
Please be my first dance partner at my birthday ball.
Come on! Hurry!
That would be my honor, my Lady.
Huh? Look at Theo. Why is he smiling in his sleep?
Shush! I'm concentrating now!
I tried so hard to look into this happy dream of these two from a hundred years ago...
Phew, this is taking a lot out of me. I don't have the strength to even talk about it.
Wow! You can actually do that? No wonder, you are a succubus.
You would be so impressed if you knew how much Mana this consumes!
Well, today is Jane's birthday, so this is the least I can do.
I don't know what will happen later,
but enjoy your sweet dreams, the two of you!
Happy birthday, Jane!
